description.value:
Defines the name of data slice in DCE where the data from `value` will be propagated on `change` or by `slice-update` event

On: any component with `value` and associated change event

Defines the event name on which `value` would be synchronized with DCE slice

On: any component with `value` and associated change event

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: hides DCE definition to prevent visual appearance of content. Wrap the payload into template tag to prevent applying the inline CSS in global scope.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: HTML tag for Custom Element. Used for window.customElements.define(). If not set, would be generated and DCE instance rendered inline.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: full, relative, or hash URL to DCE template
